name: Cross Sell Product Display For Woocommerce
author: Codextent

sections.description:
Boost your woocommerce products sells and increases conversion rate by using WooCommerce Cross Sell Products Display using widget and shortcode.

WooCommerce Cross Sell Products Display Plugin is a WordPress WooCommerce plugin that display your product cross sells products using widgets and shortcode.

A NOTE ABOUT SUPPORT: We are here to help troubleshoot bugs, but please don’t set expectations early as the support forums at WordPress.org are only checked on weekends.

SIMILAR FREE PLUGIN: Check these similar free wordpress plugins

  • Up Sell Product Display For WooCommerce
  • Recently Purchased Product Display For WooCommerce

Please check some of our other WordPress Plugins »

OVERVIEW

WooCommerce Cross Sell Products Display Plugin provide you the option to display your woocommerce cross sell products using easy to use widgets and shortcodes.

How it works?

  1. After successfull plugin activation go to your wordpress admin Widgets page.
  2. If you are in admin Widgets page, you can find a widget named Woocommerce Cross Sells Product Display.
  3. Drag this Woocommerce Cross Sells Product Display widget inside your desired sidebar then fill the widget fields and save.
  4. Now check the front end.
  5. You can also use shortcode to display Cross Sells Products. For this use the shortcode in any text widget, in post content, in page content or using php code .

SHORTCODE

You can also use [cdxwoocs] shortcode to display woocommerce cross sell products.
This shortcode has two option/attribute
1. pid – It is a mandatory attribute of the shortcode and it denotes to prodcut id of which you want to the cross sell products.
2. theme – It denotes to display layout. Use “theme-list-view” or “theme-hover” as its value.

SHORTCODE Example

[cdxwoocs pid=”101″ theme=”theme-list-view”]

IMPORTANT NOTICE

  • Plugin works based on WooCommerce plugin. So WooCommerce plugin must be installed and active for this plugin to work.
  • Plugin – Widget works only on product details page as it shows the cross sell products(if any) of the current product.
  • If you want to display cross sell products any page/post then use shortcode with proper option.
  • Target woocommerce product must have Cross-sells products set to display.
  • If you want to know how to setup woocommerce Cross-sell products try this youtube link » with many tutorials about it
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and upload the cross-sell-product-display-for-woocommerce directory to the plugin directory (/wp-content/plugins/) or install it from Plugins->Add New->Upload.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s all you need to do. You will notice a new Woocommerce Cross Sells Product Display widget in your wordpress admin widgets page.
sections.faq:
1. How many layout is included?

Right now the plugin has 2 display layout included.

2. Can we expect more layouts in future?

Yes we have plan to include more layouts in future versions or update.

3. Other problems or questions?

Other problems? Don’t forget to check the link or contact through support forum.

Please use support forum first if you have any question or queries about the plugin.

Please feel free to report any bug found to wp.codextent [at] gmail.com.
